data.persona: We are so weary from the journey from Dubai. Yet here we are; in quarantine. So many people are here getting sick.
data.description:
You are in the Dead Valley.
The desert is a dry span of hot sand.  The dunes rise and fall silently.  There is a large rock on which an iguana suns itself.  Cactus plants are scattered sparsely through the land.
The iguana is here.

You are carrying an sleeping bag and a blade, and wearing a Jacket and a hats.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow that green iguana, since it might lead me to water.
data.mid_motivation: I am thirsty and I need to find something to drink soon, otherwise I might die.
data.long_motivation: I need to make it across this desert valley so that I can sell the goods I obtained in Dubai and enjoy a life of riches.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: drink last drops of water in waterskin
